attributes.action: Make Bristol Street underpass in Swindon open for 24/7 for people's safety.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently here are the Bristol Street underpass opening times:
Monday to Friday: 7am – 9pm
Saturday: 7am – 8pm
Sunday: 10am – 6pm

This works well for Monday-Friday 9-5 workers but what about people who work shifts? They have to then do a long walk around which is not a safe walking route despite there being an underpass which could be opened 24hr/7 if Swindon council invested more.
attributes.background:
I'd like to extend the Bristol Street underpass opening times to 24hr/7.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://www.swindon.gov.uk/info/20021/councillors_democracy_and_elections/198/how_to_petition_the_council
